scripts.emulators: concurrently "cd functions && firebase functions:config:get > .runtimeconfig.json && npm run build -- --watch" "firebase emulators:start --only functions,auth,firestore,ui" "cd web && npm start"
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:functions
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build:web && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --only functions
